alerts.search_string: price > 3000 and price < 5000 and material.str.contains('Carbon') and location.str.contains('Canada') and (restrictions.str.contains('within') or restrictions.str.contains('globally')) and frame_size.str.contains('M') and (front_travel.str.contains('140') or front_travel.str.contains('130')) and (ad_title.str.contains('2018') or ad_title.str.contains('2017') or ad_title.str.contains('2019'))
price > 200 and price < 1200 and wheel_size.str.contains('700') and ad_title.str.contains('disc')

price > 100 and price <250 and location.str.contains('Canada') and description.str.lower().str.contains('carbon') and description.str.lower().str.contains('brand new') and description.str.contains('43') and description.str.lower().str.contains('mountain')
price < 4000 and frame_size == 'L' and location.str.contains('Canada') and (front_travel.str.contains('150') or front_travel.str.contains('160') or front_travel.str.contains('170'))
